dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.ent.CommonPlatformEnumeration
dataStructure.description:
States whether the fix action fully avoids the risk associated with the vulnerability or reduces risk to some extent. Enumeration values: Partial, Complete.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CommonPlatformEnumeration

child.name: cpeName
child.description:
A CPE Name is represented by a Well Formed Name (WFN) that is bound to a URI, which provides backward compatability with CPE 2.2, and a formatted string. For further details on CPE refer to NIST IRs 7695-7698. Notes: "For example, the following represents a CPE WFN definition of Microsoft Internet Explorer 8.0.6001 Beta: wfn:[part=""a"",vendor=""microsoft"",product=""internet_explorer"", version=""8\\.0\\.6001"",update=""beta""]. An example of the formatted string binding is: cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:8.0.6001:beta:*:*:*:*:*:* and URI binding is: cpe:/a:microsoft:internet_explorer:8.0.6001:beta."

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: cpeName
